actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the 7 calendar days commencing April 4, 1976, as "National Rural Health Week."

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating the seven calendar days commencing April 4, 1976, as "National Rural Health Week". Urges that efforts in disseminating health information be intensified.

titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the 7 calendar days commencing April 4, 1976, as "National Rural Health Week."
